thread.title: 14-year old Jarrius Robertson made the play of the NBA All-Star Celebrity game
thread.title_full: 14-year old Jarrius Robertson made the play of the NBA All-Star Celebrity game

author: Kofie Yeboah
title: 14-year old Jarrius Robertson made the play of the NBA All-Star Celebrity game
text:
He was ballin’ out there
The Celebrity game was more or less a snoozefest. Then all of sudden Jarrius Robertson took the court to show the players in the game how it’s done.
. @Jarrius FOR MVP. pic.twitter.com/nNpTKjFTUp 
— SLAM Magazine (@SLAMonline) February 18, 2017 Jarrius showcased his defensive ability and a nice dribble move before showing off that sweet jump shot. Cash.
For those of you that don’t know, Jarrius Robertson is a popular figure here in New Orleans. Robertson has biliary atresia, a chronic liver condition, and is in need of his second liver transplant. However, he doesn’t let that get him down. He’s been kicking it with some of the NBA All-Stars so far.
this boy @Money23Green about to catch my fade trying to cop my chain bruh @warriors #NBAAllStar pic.twitter.com/zmalhdngQR 
— Jarrius Robertson (@Jarrius) February 18, 2017 keepin it real with @russwest44 @okcthunder #NBAAllStar pic.twitter.com/o5tbZEOuZr 
— Jarrius Robertson (@Jarrius) February 17, 2017 Coaching up @AntDavis23 #NBAAllStar pic.twitter.com/298mlZfTpW 
— Jarrius Robertson (@Jarrius) February 17, 2017 What a cool kid.
You can contribute to Jarrius’ medical bills by donating here .
